title: Lindsay Lohan makes savage dig at Miley Cyrus and new boyfriend Cody Simpson
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Miley Cyrus is loved-up with her new boyfriend Cody Simpson, but not everyone is happy for them - enter Lindsay Lohan.

The actress, 33, made a savage dig at Cody's expense on her Instagram account last night, before swiftly deleting it.

Her issue with the singer, 22, appears to stem from the brief period when he dated her younger sister Aliana following his split from model Gigi Hadid.

She posted a snap of Cody and her 25-year-old sibling, saying he had "settled for less" with Miley, 26, and claiming he had "lost his fortune".

Lindsay wrote: "When you realise you failed. And you settle for less @codysimpson.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Family is everything you won the masked singer but you lost your future."

Cody recently won the Australian version of the Masked Singer, on which Lindsay is a judge.

They had a run-in during the finale when he was unmasked as The Robot.

(Image: Getty)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Lindsay claimed she had bought him furniture from his home in Los Angeles and asked him when he was going to return it.

Cody and Miley confirmed their romance on October 4, just two months after she split from husband Liam Hemsworth.

Their romance was born out of their years of friendship after they first crossed paths with each other in 2014.

(Image: Instagram)

She enjoyed a brief dalliance with Kaitlynn Carter after they were spotted locking lips on a boat in Lake Como.

But the chart-topper soon ended things after just six weeks of romancing.

She's since been flaunting her new relationship with Cody all over social media.
description: Her issue with the singer, 22, appears to stem from the brief period when he dated her younger sister Aliana
